stories.Title: Claude 2: Friendly and safe
stories.Description: Anthropic's new release, Claude 2, is proving to be a major contender alongside chatbots like ChatGPT and Pi. With enhanced performance and reduced harmful outputs.
stories.Tweet: Claude 2: Friendly and safe 📦 Anthropic's new release, Claude 2, is proving to be a major contender alongside chatbots like ChatGPT and Pi. With enhanced performance and reduced harmful outputs. #anthropic https://www.forbes.com/sites/alexkonrad/2023/07/11/anthropic-ai-claude-2-release/?sh=61f12535146f

stories.Title: Launching made simple
stories.Description: Longshot Space aims for a simpler, more affordable space launch solution. Using a kinetic launch system that's cheaper to build and operate, they hope to reach hypersonic speeds.
stories.Tweet: Launching made simple 📦 Longshot Space aims for a simpler, more affordable space launch solution. Using a kinetic launch system that's cheaper to build and operate, they hope to reach hypersonic speeds. #rocketscience https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/10/longshot-space-wants-to-make-space-launch-dumb-and-really-cheap-too/

stories.Title: Big progress for JUICE!
stories.Description: ESA's JUICE mission shared captivating ultraviolet views from its UVS instrument, revealing a dazzling Milky Way adorned with shimmering stars from the southern sky.
stories.Tweet: Big progress for JUICE! 📦 ESA's JUICE mission shared captivating ultraviolet views from its UVS instrument, revealing a dazzling Milky Way adorned with shimmering stars from the southern sky. #JUICE https://gizmodo.com/starry-swoosh-jupiter-probe-encouraging-sign-1850621250

stories.Title: SpaceX keeps breaking records
stories.Description: With the successful launch and landing of Falcon 9 on July 9th, the B1058 booster achieved an incredible milestone of 16 flights. Setting new reusability standards in the industry.
stories.Tweet: SpaceX keeps breaking records 📦 With the successful launch and landing of Falcon 9 on July 9th, the B1058 booster achieved an incredible milestone of 16 flights. Setting new reusability standards in the industry. #rocketscience https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/spacex-breaks-record-falcon-9-16th-launch

stories.Title: China's methane-fueled ambitions
stories.Description: Landspace's Zhuque-2 rocket prepares for its second test flight, aiming to reach orbit with its methane-powered engines. A launch that could mark a significant milestone in rocket propulsion.
stories.Tweet: China's methane-fueled ambitions 📦 Landspace's Zhuque-2 rocket prepares for its second test flight, aiming to reach orbit with its methane-powered engines. A launch that could mark a significant milestone in rocket propulsion. #rocketscience https://gizmodo.com/landspace-methane-rocket-could-orbit-for-first-time-1850621557

stories.Title: Struggles in Google's AR journey
stories.Description: As the AR landscape grows more competitive, Google's AR team keeps facing challenges. This time, Mark Lucovsky, former head of operating systems, bids farewell, citing unstable commitment and vision.
stories.Tweet: Struggles in Google's AR journey 📦 As the AR landscape grows more competitive, Google's AR team keeps facing challenges. This time, Mark Lucovsky, former head of operating systems, bids farewell, citing unstable commitment and vision. #google https://www.theverge.com/2023/7/10/23790393/google-ar-software-leader-mark-lucovsky-project-iris

stories.Title: Microsoft announces more layoffs
stories.Description: Following previous downsizing efforts, Microsoft has announced additional job cuts as part of ongoing restructuring, focusing on salespeople and customer success representatives.
stories.Tweet: Microsoft announces more layoffs 📦 Following previous downsizing efforts, Microsoft has announced additional job cuts as part of ongoing restructuring, focusing on salespeople and customer success representatives. #microsoft https://www.cnbc.com/2023/07/10/microsoft-confirms-more-job-cuts-on-top-of-10000-layoffs-in-january.html

stories.Title: Enhancing astronaut style
stories.Description: NASA has expanded its contracts with Axiom Space and Collins Aerospace, providing $5 million to each to develop advanced spacesuits, for both spacewalks outside the ISS and lunar surface missions.
stories.Tweet: Enhancing astronaut style 📦 NASA has expanded its contracts with Axiom Space and Collins Aerospace, providing $5 million to each to develop advanced spacesuits, for both spacewalks outside the ISS and lunar surface missions. #NASA https://www.engadget.com/nasa-expands-developers-contracts-for-its-next-gen-spacesuits-054254263.html

stories.Title: A flying car earns FAA approval
stories.Description: The futuristic vision portrayed in movies may soon become a reality with Alef Automotive's Model A. This remarkable fully electric vehicle combines the ability to fly and travel on public roads.
stories.Tweet: A flying car earns FAA approval 📦 The futuristic vision portrayed in movies may soon become a reality with Alef Automotive's Model A. This remarkable fully electric vehicle combines the ability to fly and travel on public roads. #innovation https://edition.cnn.com/2023/07/03/tech/flying-car-faa/index.html

stories.Title: Audi sets sights on China's EV market
stories.Description: Audi is reportedly exploring partnerships in China to acquire its next-gen EV platform. A strategic move that signals its commitment to electrification.
stories.Tweet: Audi sets sights on China's EV market 📦 Audi is reportedly exploring partnerships in China to acquire its next-gen EV platform. stories.Title: Apple’s approach to folding
stories.Description: Reports suggests a potential foldable MacBook Pro is on the horizon. With a tablet-like display, and a foldable lower section serving as a keyboard.
stories.Tweet: Apple’s approach to folding 📦 Reports suggests a potential foldable MacBook Pro is on the horizon. With a tablet-like display, and a foldable lower section serving as a keyboard. #apple https://www.t3.com/news/apple-s-first-foldable-will-be-a-macbook-says-report
